conk out.translation[0].definitions[0].d: if a machine or car conks out, it suddenly stops working
conk out.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Our car conked out on the way home.
conk out.translation[0].definitions[1].d: if someone conks out, they fall asleep because they are very tired
conk out.translation[0].definitions[1].e: I got home from work and I just conked out on the sofa.
